objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold
• Pink Drop Wreath Design
• Perfect Gift for Her
• Certificate of Authenticity

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant square banner is divided into four soft pink color-block quadrants, creating a harmonious and feminine aesthetic. Dominating the design are two high-quality images of a circular jewelry piece with rose gold and crystal elements. The top-left corner houses a bold heading (`heading`) in deep rose, followed by a refined subheading (`subheading`) in deep plum serif font that emphasizes timeless beauty and craftsmanship. Below it, a bullet-pointed description (`description`) outlines key product features with consistent pink tones. A large, highlighted price (`price`) adds prominence, placed above a soft-rounded rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background`, `cta`). The layout is modern and clean with delicate wave accents and dotted motifs integrated into the background.

**Color Palette**:
- Rose Pink: `#C85B70`
- Blush Pink: `#FBECF3`
- Pale Pink: `#FFD1D6`
- Light Mauve: `#F8E2E8`
- Deep Plum: `#98405F`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings with a delicate blend of blush pink and sparkling white tones. The dominant color is a soft rose gold-pink (#F4A6A1), used in the metal frame, giving the piece a luxurious and feminine appeal. Accentuating the elegance are clear, crystal-like stones in brilliant white (#FFFFFF) and translucent hues with icy undertones (#E7E7E7), creating highlights and depth. The marquise and round-cut crystals are strategically placed to catch light, enhancing the overall sparkle. These colors harmoniously blend yet contrast elegantly, ideal for an advertisement banner featuring white, soft pink, rose gold, and silver tones.
